white-junior: Starting from TODO, perform a standing double punch
purple-junior: Starting from TODO, perform a standing double punch, followed by a back leg 45 kick
This technique is freestyle, so you and the pad holder will be moving around
orange-junior: Starting from TODO, perform a front leg side piercing kick
This technique is freestyle, so you and the pad holder will be moving around
white-senior: Starting from TODO, perform a standing double punch
yellow-stripe: Starting from TODO, perform a sliding double punch, followed immediately by a sliding double punch backwards
yellow: Starting from TODO, perform a sliding double side piercing kick
green-stripe: Starting from TODO, Perform a double side piercing kick, followed by a double punch, a single side piercing kick, and a double punch moving backwards
green: Starting from TODO, perform a backfist, followed by a reverse knifehand, then a 45 kick
This can be performed going forwards or backwards - The pad holder will decide by moving that direction
blue-stripe: Starting from TODO, perform a 45 kick off the back leg, followed by a reverse punch, and stepping back at 90Â° to the left
blue: Starting from TODO, perform a double step 45 kick, followed by a back kick, and a jumping double punch
This technique is freestyle, so it will be performed while moving around
red-stripe: Starting from TODO, perform a double punch, followed by a 45 kick, landing with the same foot behind to perform a reverse turning kick
This technique is freestyle, so it will be performed while moving around
red: Starting from TODO, perform a front or back leg 45 kick, depending on which side is open. If the pad holder steps forwards on their right foot, attack their left side
Following this technique, the pad holder will hold up the pad for a reverse turning kick. Adjust stance if necessary to perform this kick
This technique is freestyle, so it will be performed while moving around
